column1: #Text=Yitzhak Apeloig , the President of Israel 's renowned Technion , told David Shankbone that he noticed the quality of Hebrew spoken by the students at the Israeli M.I.T. had decreased , and that " some professors have difficulty understanding their students . "
#Text=Peres waived such concerns aside : " They think everything is being ruined and is decaying .
